Package net.ttddyy.dsproxy.support

Class Summary
BeanNameProxyDataSource Extending ProxyDataSource to use spring bean name(id) as dataSourceName when it is not set.
CommonsLogUtils  
CommonsQueryCountLoggingFilter Servlet Filter to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging.
CommonsQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor Spring HandlerInterceptor to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging.
CommonsQueryCountLoggingRequestListener ServletRequestListener to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging.
DataSourceProxyNativeJdbcExtractor Spring NativeJdbcExtractor for our proxy classes.
ProxyConnectionAdvice Support injecting proxies by AOP.
ProxyDataSource A proxy of DataSource with QueryExecutionListener.
QueryCounterClearFilter Servlet filter to clear the QueryCount stored in thread local at the end of the http servlet request lifecycle when DataSourceQueryCountListener is used.
QueryCounterClearHandlerInterceptor Spring HandlerInterceptor to clear QueryCount stored in thread local when DataSourceQueryCountListener is used.
QueryCounterClearServletRequestListener ServletRequestListener to clear QueryCount stored in thread local when DataSourceQueryCountListener is used.
SLF4JLogUtils  
SLF4JQueryCountLoggingFilter  
SLF4JQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor  
SLF4JQueryCountLoggingRequestListener
